pr_title: CATROID-804 Replace privacy dialog with link to privacy policy web page

timeline.message: CATROID-804 Replace privacy dialog with link to privacy policy web page

timeline.body:
```suggestion
	public static final String CATROBAT_PRIVACY_POLICY_URL = "https://catrob.at/createatschoolprivacy";
```
See description in https://jira.catrob.at/browse/CATROID-804
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
public static final String CATROBAT_PRIVACY_POLICY_URL = "https://catrob.at/privacypolicy";
public static final String CATROBAT_PRIVACY_POLICY_URL = "https://catrob.at/createatschoolprivacy";

See description in https://jira.catrob.at/browse/CATROID-804
timeline.author: wslany

timeline.message: CATROID-804 Replace privacy dialog with link to privacy policy web page

timeline.body: Thank you for adding this. However, when I changed the https://catrob.at/createatschoolprivacy short url just now to point to our main developer page instead of the privacy policy subpage (please try it out --- I'll change it back to the privacy page once this is fixed --- please remind me) and compiled the Create@School flavor: https://jenkins.catrob.at/job/Catroid/job/PR-3863/8/artifact/catroid/build/outputs/apk/createAtSchool/debug/catroid-createAtSchool-debug-PR-3863-8.apk --- the privacy policy button nevertheless still opens the main privacy policy page. Please fix.
timeline.bodyText: Thank you for adding this. Please fix.
